name: Mannequin Challenge - The Camera Man Edition
name_original: Mannequin Challenge - The Camera Man Edition
description:
The official Mannequin Challenge game is here!

Film the Mannequin Challenge without colliding into anyone.
____________________________________________

• Simple sliding gameplay
• Endless mode
• Randomized levels
____________________________________________

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
